Makes taxid signatures for physiologies

make_signatures.Rd

Makes taxid signatures for physiologies

make_signatures(df, taxids = "Taxon_name", rank = "all")

Arguments

df

A data.frame output by the physiologies function
taxids

identification of the bugs (Taxon name, NCBI ID, etc.)
rank

Nothing yet

Value

a large list of character vectors

Examples

aero <- physiologies("aerophilicity")

#> Finished aerophilicity
x <- make_signatures(aero[[1]], taxids = "Taxon_name")
lapply(x, head)

#> $`obligately aerobic`
#> [1] "Acanthopleuribacter " "Acetobacter"          "Achromobacter "      
#> [4] "Acidobacterium "      "Agreia"               "Albibacter "         
#> 
#> $aerobic
#> [1] "Acaricomes"     "Acidicapsa "    "Acidimicrobium" "Acidiphilium"  
#> [5] "Acidipila"      "Acidisphaera"  
#> 
#> $`obligately anaerobic`
#> [1] "Acetanaerobacterium " "Acetitomaculum"       "Acetivibrio"         
#> [4] "Acetoanaerobium"      "Alistipes"            "Anaeroarcus"         
#> 
#> $anaerobic
#> [1] "Acetatifactor"   "Acetobacterium"  "Acetofilamentum" "Acetohalobium"  
#> [5] "Acetomicrobium"  "Acetonema"      
#> 
#> $`facultatively anaerobic`
#> [1] "Acholeplasma"    "Acidianus "      "Acidiplasma"     "Actinobacillus "
#> [5] "Aerococcus"      "Aeromonas"      
#> 
#> $microaerophilic
#> [1] "Agrococcus "    "Azoarcus "      "Azorhizobium"   "Azospirillum"  
#> [5] "Coenonia "      "Herbaspirillum"
#> 
#> $`obligate aerobic`
#> [1] "Cellulosilyticum " "Sulfolobus "      
#> 
#> $microaerobic
#> [1] "Spirillum "
#> 
x <- make_signatures(aero[[1]], taxids = "NCBI_ID")
lapply(x, head)

#> $`obligately aerobic`
#> [1] 442869    434    222  33973 110934 160700
#> 
#> $aerobic
#> [1]  291967 1078830   53634     522   50714  119977
#> 
#> $`obligately anaerobic`
#> [1] 258514  31980  35829 186831 239759 151038
#> 
#> $anaerobic
#> [1]  33951 558418  28186  49894   2373  65402
#> 
#> $`facultatively anaerobic`
#> [1]   2147  12914 507753    713   1375    642
#> 
#> $microaerophilic
#> [1] 46352 12960     6   191 78328   963
#> 
#> $`obligate aerobic`
#> [1] 698776   2284
#> 
#> $microaerobic
#> [1] 967
#>
